name: Roshambo Rumble
description:
Pizza or Chinese? Movies or video games? Our lives are full of difficult decisions. And one of the most tried-and-true methods for making those tough decisions is a quick game of Rock Paper Scissors, also known as Roshambo.

But for some, Roshambo is more than a way to decide who gets to eat the last french fry. It's more than just a game--it's a lifestyle. For these street-wise warriors, the spirit of Roshambo is in the air they breathe, the clothes they wear, and the words they speak. They don't just play Rock Paper Scissors; they play Roshambo Rumble.

This game was created from start to finish in one 40-hour work week (Monday through Friday, 8am to 5pm) as a personal game development challenge. See more at the Fridgecrisis Games website.
